comments.content:
I think some of Rian Hughes fonts like [Freeman](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128165941/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=DET0000122) & [Gravel](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128165941/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=DET0000183) have strong physical resemblances to this, but not a real match.   
   
This font looks like it could be another weight of almost either of these.
Have you find finaly wrc's font? I am searching it too, but the two suggested a message above doesn't seem to match it.

Phew, I've been looking around and at first I thought it   
might be something from [Psy/Ops](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128165941/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_reykjavik2.html), but then I checked the   
wrc.com website and noticed quite a few characters made   
me think of the work of [Gareth Hague](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128165941/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=237&dw=1407). In short: I haven't   
got a clue (yet).   
   
BTW Please don't apologize for your English: it's fine, and   
BTW we have lots of non-native English speakers showing   
up here. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128165941im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
